body.p: Qt4 is on its way into Portage, the Alpha team has delivered a status update, and Forums statistics can now be viewed as graphs, reports this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. Read on to find a new document explaining the editorial guidelines and process for publishing the GWN, the move to modular X in the Future zone, a cross-section of several mailing lists and the pre-announcement of the Gentoo Summer Camp planned in Germany. Press clippings, statistics from the Gentoo Bugzilla and security announcements complete the current issue. Have fun reading the GWN.
